content:
I'm just curious though -- in chrome I do see
image.png
image.png

which I don't yet understand.

Ah, firefox has a much nicer view

image.png

My various CLI tools are being served a different cert from my web browsers which makes debugging annoying, but today I learned Firefox's "about:certificate" is awesome. Displays full detail including extensions like SubjectAltName and has convenient views up the chain as well as download buttons to save PEMs.

Example URL that resolves in firefox

about:certificate?cert=MIIIjDCCB3SgAwIBAgISBLw0yI6PjqFIH2zvj%%2FS9Pa0vj%2F%2BmlriOS1f1a%2Fq46rwi6DDWTQBhAXyKOKZ5z0ZKbOnuq%2FgWFaj8olF09xKQ9%2B4O6o09F540VbLWu%2Bs9OpCEvW8YhC7AZbFaK4l1Bux9lzzCX6e1SJMsp1WGsAgnR%2Btit55CUiUh%2BU6vJnvzX2g1Y3H111cvJI60YoMQmIA7BY2FHvsUktwC0%2FZ6dmEPCgtTfmE5epfHhd25QsMncstGk2hqJ7yfMFdyhSo9xJ5b%2FkUOpbvQvoUrjAgMBAAGjggWrMIIFpzAOBgNVHQ8BAf8EBAMCBaAwHQYDVR0lBBYwFAYIKwYBBQUHAwEGCCsGAQUFBwMCMAwGA1UdEwEB%2FwQCMAAwHQYDVR0OBBYEFKb%%%2BbjhjbocDQRv2%2Bc3e2%2BBOjPwWAHUARqVV63X6kSAwtaKJafTzfREsQXS%2B%2FUm4havy%2FHD%2BbUcAAAF%2FdY4KyAAABAMARjBEAh9pukSEFydqlSP0Z3Vo4BZWlTRSSVXb6Gf%2BqFdGzGyPAiEAwGJIFpul5%2FlYioFLziKosOA5Os9RYc%2BV06Uy3R33jKQwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQADggEBADAJotWqfBILXpi4duGc2c4zf5jbYZRop%2BWH9TbOCw8y%2B304EKiv6tufQgEFWgItBaDQxpgqHC0W0tPMu4mvoCNpt5NyklP6Af2W8Bh6BHhOSqxirWdONpr7U131cC5cCYRMfCqiLJ7dFTEW51C6DWLbOWg1kXPHM7wUYkVQdLwRotdkqH7%2Fni80VlXWn1sIwA89DsdojvgRPrGkPhLrTmLS6y8fIdYVmZVkznsza%2BKAil82WIdhRr8JnO9uXC8Qz4pbnZpAtGvA7kDHYMEobXshqNG%2FW1mJqE7QUMN10A%2FWd2VwatXh%2FkMf1coqnh4Op%2FWN8gOKdyZVvgnluNTDkAo%3D&cert=MIIFFjCCAv6gAwIBAgIRAJErCErPDBinU%%2BILxmaZ6QoinXSaqtSu5xUyxr45r%2BXXIo9cPR5QUVTVXjJ6oojkZ9YI8QqlObvU7wy7bjcCwXPNZOOftz2nwWgsbvsCUJCWH%2BjdxsxPnHKzhm%2B%2Fb5DtFUkWWqcFTzjTIUu61ru2P3mBw4qVUq7ZtDpelQDRrK9O8ZutmNHz6a4uPVymZ%2BDAXXbpyb%2FuBxa3Shlg9F8fnCbvxK%2FeG3MHacV3URuPMrSXBiLxgZ3Vms%2FEY96Jc5lP%2FOoi2R6X%2FExjqmAl3P51T%2Bc8B5fWmcBcUr2Ok%2F5mzk53cU6cG%2FkiFHaFpriV1uxPMUgP17VGhi9sVAgMBAAGjggEIMIIBBDAOBgNVHQ8BAf8EBAMCAYYwHQYDVR0lBBYwFAYIKwYBBQUHAwIGCCsGAQUFBwMBMBIGA1UdEwEB%%2B34IL9fzLdwALduO%2FZelN7kIJ%2Bm74uyA%2BeitRY8kc607TkC53wlikfmZW4%2FRvTZ8M6UK%2B5UzhK8jCdLuMGYL6KvzXGRSgi3yLgjewQtCPkIVz6D2QQzCkcheAmCJ8MqyJu5zlzyZMjAvnnAT45tRAxekrsu94sQ4egdRCnbWSDtY7kh%2BBImlJNXoB1lBMEKIq4QDUOXoRgffuDghje1WrG9ML%2BHbisq%2FyFOGwXD9RiX8F6sw6W4avAuvDszue5L3sz85K%2BEC4Y%2FwFVDNvZo4TYXao6Z0f%2BlQKc0t8DQYzk1OXVu8rp2yJMC6alLbBfODALZvYH7n7do1AZls4I9d1P4jnkDrQoxB3UqQ9hVl3LEKQ73xF1OyK5GhDDX8oVfGKF5u%2BdecIsH4YaTw7mP3GFxJSqv3%2B0lUFJoi5Lc5da149p90IdshCExroL1%
